SEARCH
Package com.financial.entries

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.financial.entries.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityLogic
public class Entity extends Object implements EntityLogic
**Represents** a high-level government Entity (such as a Ministry or Agency).

This class serves as the primary data container for an organization's financial records. It implements EntityLogic and manages three distinct budget streams: Regular Budget, National PIB, and Co-funded PIB. It provides extensive methods for financial querying, aggregation, and strategic budget adjustments.

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(String entityCode, String entityName)
      **Initializes** a new Entity and **links** it to its respective expenditure records.

      Upon instantiation, the Entity automatically fetches all relevant expenses from the static registries of RegularBudgetExpense, PublicInvestmentBudgetNationalExpense, and PublicInvestmentBudgetCoFundedExpense based on its unique entity code.

      Parameters:
      entityCode - **Unique identifier** for the Ministry/Agency.
      entityName - **Official name** of the Entity.

  • Method Details

    • findEntityWithEntityCode

      public static Entity findEntityWithEntityCode(String entityCode)
      **Performs** a global search to locate a specific Entity instance by its code.
      Parameters:
      entityCode - The code to search for.
      Returns:
      The matching Entity object or null if not found.

    • implementChangesInAllExpenseCategoriesOfAllServices

      public void implementChangesInAllExpenseCategoriesOfAllServices(double percentage, long fixedAmount, BudgetType budgetType)
      **Implements** financial changes across **all categories and services** for a specific budget type.
      Parameters:
      percentage - The **percentage shift** (e.g., 0.05 for 5%).
      fixedAmount - The **fixed amount** to add/subtract.
      budgetType - The **target budget stream** (Regular, National, Co-funded).

    • implementChangesInSpecificExpenseCategoryOfAllServices

      Parameters:

    • implementChangesInAllExpenseCategoriesOfSpecificService

    • implementChangesInSpecificExpenseCategoryOfSpecificService

      public void implementChangesInSpecificExpenseCategoryOfSpecificService(String serviceCode, String categoryCode, double percentage, long fixedAmount, BudgetType budgetType)
      **Granular update** for one **specific category within one specific service**.

      Includes **error handling** to revert to previous states via ExpensesHistory if the update fails.
